attributes.review: I open this app to find a picture of a racist, orange, wig wearing, bald headed, hot cheeto looking man on the app and then i saw 'Trump 2020' which really disgusted me and annoyed me and then i found out that he wants to ban tiktok and then i HAD to delete the app.
attributes.title: Bad app😒

attributes.review: If tiktok get’s banned for real then we aren’t going down without a fight. If enough people rate this app 1 Star then the App Store can take it down! If you are interested please try to help!
attributes.title: To save tiktok!

attributes.review: I didn’t even put my email in and I already hated the app. It is ridiculous. Plus u wanna take away TikTok. As soon as I saw his face I threw my phone and cracked my screen and screamed. We hate u Donald. #Kanye for president
attributes.title: We want Kanye

attributes.review: This app is sure to make your device lag to the max and the first thing that pops when you open the app is a Cheeto and I am very allergic to the sight of those, I had to get therapy smh my head 😤😜
attributes.title: Oh honey noo

attributes.review: This app is so bad like as soon as I opened it my phone started glitching and it doesn’t usually do that and this app is just trash and lets delete this app before trump deletes tiktok
attributes.title: Don’t get it

attributes.review: I just came here to delete this app and be able to keep tiktok cuz no one what’s to this OrangeOrangutan to delete it sooooo yea make sure to put a one star and hope this app gets delete too 😌💅✨
This app has a photo of a sweat cheeto bag that just got back from working out. Along with this the app is very slow and once loaded with nonstop send notifications
attributes.title: Terrible app

attributes.review: When I used this app...hunni no- this app gave me cancer 🤮. The worst part is as soon as I opened the app U G H I smelled t e r r i b l e sis I’m telling you never EVER use this app. It’ll make you wanna have a spray tan and think about white supremacy 24/7.
attributes.title: Made me smell like cheetos 🤮

attributes.review: I absolutely hate this app, so many disgusting questions, one even said “wanna help trump get re-elected?” That is not how you talk to people. What a disgrace of an app . I hope it’s deleted for good 🤮 I am absolutely sick
attributes.title: I hate it

attributes.review: Right when I opened the app I saw an ugly racist rat he really scared me I even fainted it also glitches a lot one last thing trump 2020 in a grave oh wait he does not deserve one or a life everyone hates him
attributes.title: Trump 2020 belongs to the streets
